summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A TEGOL OUTLAW MOTORCYCLE HELMET, V-5 SERIES. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 17E015000 (EQUIPMENT). THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED AT 1-866-371-0281 APPROXIMATELY THREE MONTHS AGO. THE CONTACT LEFT THE REQUIRED VOICEMAIL FOR A CALL BACK, BUT HAD NOT RECEIVED A RESPONSE. IN ADDITION, THE CONTACT SENT AN EMAIL TO TEGOLINC@GMAIL.COM, BUT NO RESPONSE WAS PROVIDED. THE CONTACT FELT THAT A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME HAD PASSED FOR THE RECALL REMEDY. THE SPECIFIC HELMET MODEL WAS UNKNOWN. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT.
